name: Peridot and Flower Metal link earrings
description:
I thought that the flower stamped metal link needed a bit of color so I ended up adding a lovely Peridot faceted rondelle.  The look of the earrings is ideal for everyday wear.

Peridot is the gemstone for the month of August.

The earrings measure almost 2" in length and hang from stainless steel ear hooks.

name: Copper and Bone earrings
description:
I thought that the flat Copper beads are a great complement to the long twisted bone beads.  The earrings are light weight and a bit on the long side as they measure about 2.5" in length.

The earrings hang from Niobium ear hooks and other metal components are Copper.

name: Apatite and Garnet earrings
description:
I found these lovely Apatite smooth teardrops and hanged them from a Garnet wire wrapped link to create a delicate ensemble.  The Apatite teardrops are a bit "rough around the edges" as they inclusions and patterns on their surface.  The Garnet round beads are wire wrapped with thin gauge wire that emphasizes the small size of the Garnet beads (2mm).

The earrings are almost 2" in length.  The ear hooks are sterling silver while the rest of the metal components are silver filled.

name: Pearl Cluster earrings
description:
I love pearls, any size or shape.  I decided to make a little cluster to hang together and ended up wire wrapping "stems" on them to change it up a bit.  The fresh water pearls are a deep red/maroon color that look awesome with about anything.

The earrings measure almost 2" in length. All metal components are sterling silver.

name: Familia Bracelet
description:
I found these cute metal letter beads and somehow ended up with enough to spell the word "familia" which is family in Spanish.  I ended up adding a Hamsa hand charm with a red coral bead to add contrast to the royal blue beads that I used to complete the necklace.

The total length of the necklace is 7.5".
